body: NaPaTa's most recent work was published in Comic Kairakuten 2021-09 last year. It's translated by Fakku so it can't be posted here because DMCA. Anyway, I think they're just on a hiatus and not retirement.

Um, iirc NaPaTa did some work last year for the now -not available anymore in nhentai.net- COMIC Kairakuten. If he did announce retirement in his Twitter or any posts, I'd like to see proof. Or if there was no more work made for over 2 years, then yea I'd consider that retirement/not doing this anymore. Or unless the named artist passed away, as in early this year Jan 2022 we lost Miyabe Kiwi-sensei.
Now Napata seems to be in full retirement mode
More like pussy food for us from NaPaTa, yummy!
